ComicInfo.Title: Cobra World Order Part Three
ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary: Cobra World Order Part Three: Duke gets reacquainted with his long-lost wife Claire. Cobra makes an attempt to eliminate the dissenters who had allied with Zartan and Destro but the Dreadnoks destroy the hit squad. Hawk stops another Blue Ninja plot, this time at Southampton. The Joes at Fort Wadsworth find a Crimson Guardsman bunker in Sean's old family home. Firefly's allies kidnap Wendy and use the Brainwave Scanner on her.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-08 04:05:33. [CVDB507796] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:36:51. [Issue ID 1514185]
